quote: The (extremely lavish set) was created by a transparency, a fine gauze, finely painted. According to the theatre accounts, it cost 241 ducats, 91 ducats more than Rossini was paid for the music.
quote_letters: THE EXTREMELY LAVISH SET WAS CREATED BY A TRANSPARENCY A FINE GAUZE FINELY PAINTED ACCORDING TO THE THEATRE ACCOUNTS IT COST  DUCATS  DUCATS MORE THAN ROSSINI WAS PAID FOR THE MUSIC
